last_episode_to_air.name: Nedley's Glasses
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Nedley compromises his sight by wearing a pair of glasses to look more sophisticated, the others plead with him to take them off.

name: Maggie and the Ferocious Beast
overview: A precocious 5-year-old named Maggie conjures up an imaginary land where she and her favorite toys, Hamilton Hocks and Ferocious Beast, can play and have adventures. The Ferocious Beast is anything but ferocious, though he is large, with red spots and three horns on his head.

episodes.name: My One and Only Box
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton and the Beast are having great fun in the snow, making snow sculptures and snow angels, and throwing snowballs. Hamilton's box makes a very good sled, until it hits a rock and is torn. Hamilton is filled with remorse, and sings a sad little song about his beloved box. Maggie eventually saves the day, fixing the tear with one of the Beast's spots.

episodes.name: Spot the Spot
episodes.overview: How many spots does a Ferocious Beast have? Maggie and Hamilton find out that counting them isn't as easy as you'd think! When she tries to count the spots on the Beast's back, Maggie finds herself caught up a tree and her friends have to help her get back down.

episodes.name: Recipe for Trouble
episodes.overview: Hamilton the chef needs an extra big pumpkin for his pumpkin brulé soufflé flambé recipe. When the Beast and Maggie arrive with the other ingredients, they find that Hamilton has dug his way into an enormous pumpkin and can't get out again!

episodes.name: A Lemonade Stand
episodes.overview: The Beast really likes the band-aid Maggie has on her knee and will not rest until he can have one too. Meanwhile Maggie and Hamilton make some ice cold lemonade to sell. They don't have any customers, but they sure enjoy drinking the lemonade!

episodes.name: Walk the Walk
episodes.overview: It's a superb day at the beach and Sidestep the crab is showing Maggie, Hamilton and the Beast how to walk crab-style. The Beast gets a little carried away and accidentally knocks over Sidestep's little house. Maggie, Hamilton and the Beast build Sidestep a beautiful new sand castle to live in and all is forgiven.

episodes.name: What's in a Laugh?
episodes.overview: Hamilton isn't very happy when the Beast says he snorts when he laughs. In fact, he goes into his box and won't come out to play. Maggie and the Beast lure him out again by making paper hats.

episodes.name: Pack Up Your Troubles
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton and the Beast are having a bad day. Maggie's drawing is ruined, the Beast is having difficulty with his origami, and Hamilton accidentally squashes a whole batch of muffins. They decide to send their troubles off to sea in little paper boats. After the boats are made, however, they realize they don't really have any troubles at all!

episodes.name: Rub-A-Dub-Dub
episodes.overview: It's just rained and the Beast can't resist sliding through the puddles, making him the ferociously muddy beast! Maggie decides it's high time the Beast took a bath, so he starts sudsing up in the River of Dreams while Hamilton washes his spots out by hand. When the spots dry, however, they end up all wrinkly! The Beast can't wear wrinkly spots! Maggie comes up with the solution - they simply press the spots flat in a great big book.

episodes.name: The Big Carrot
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton and the Beast come upon a gigantic carrot, and a very strange little rabbit named Nedley who speaks in rhymes.

episodes.name: Out of Water Beast
episodes.overview: It's hot! Very hot! It's even too hot to walk to the beach. Fortunately Hamilton has an inflatable wading pool they can play in, but the Beast is too big to fit into it. How can they all have fun and cool off in the little pool? The solution: the Beast holds the water hose pointing up like a fountain and Maggie and Hamilton use him as a big spotted water slide!

episodes.name: Rain, Rain, Come and Stay
episodes.overview: It always rains in the Land of the Umbrella Trees, so the three friends are sure to dress up in their slickers and boots to travel there. While he's splashing around, the Beast loses his beloved red boot in a deep, deep puddle. Time to get out the rods and go boot fishing!

episodes.name: Hamilton the Ham
episodes.overview: On a trip to Mooville, Maggie, Hamilton and the Beast meet the Moo Sisters, a trio of singing cows. The Moo Sisters think Hamilton has a beautiful voice and egg him on to sing a song. Hamilton is very shy at first, but once he gets going he turns out to be a real ham!

episodes.name: This Little Pig
episodes.overview: Hamilton wakes up with a bad cold and has to stay in bed. His friends' efforts to nurse him back to health are just bothering him and keeping him awake. In the end Maggie and the Beast compose a special Get Well poem for their sick friend, then tiptoe away to let him sleep.

episodes.name: Hide and Go Beast
episodes.overview: It's not easy to find a hiding spot for hide-and-go-seek when you're a very large and a very spotted ferocious beast. After a lot of thought the Beast finally comes up with the PERFECT hiding spot - in the pumpkin patch - and nobody can find him!

episodes.name: One, Two, Three
episodes.overview: The three friends certainly have their hands full when Maggie brings her three baby nephews to Nowhere Land. It's hard work running after triplets, feeding them and keeping them clean, but the hardest job of all is just telling them apart. When it's time for the babies to go back home, Hamilton and the Beast are all worn out!

episodes.name: What's in a Bag?
episodes.overview: Maggie has a bag full of very unusual jelly beans. For starters, they won't stop arguing over which colour jelly bean is the best. Hamilton and Maggie try washing off their colours to help them get along, but the jelly beans aren't very happy being all the same. Hamilton solves the problem by re-dying them back the way they were.

episodes.name: Beastly Picture
episodes.overview: Maggie has painted a wonderful portrait of the Beast. When the Beast accidentally ruins the painting, he tries to paint a replacement, but it's very hard to paint with big beastly paws. His artwork sure doesn't fool Maggie, but she loves it just the same.

episodes.name: The Push-Me Popper
episodes.overview: Hamilton has won a prize in a cooking contest - it's a push-me popper toy, and it immediately becomes Hamilton's most prized possession. The Beast plays with it without Hamilton's permission and accidentally breaks it, which causes friction between the two friends. Luckily Maggie is able to fix the toy and they all take turns playing with it.

episodes.name: Sun Spots
episodes.overview: It's a lovely day at the beach and the Beast is having so much fun he forgets to put on his sun block. Uh oh! He gets a beastly sunburn, and turns all red! And when Hamilton sees him in the water he thinks he's a sea monster!

episodes.name: Say Cheese
episodes.overview: When Maggie gives the Beast a framed picture of the two of them, Hamilton thinks she likes the Beast better than him. Maggie reassures Hamilton that she likes him just as much as she likes the Beast. He may not be big and have spots, but he does have lovely velvety pink skin. Cheered up, Hamilton agrees to let the Beast take a picture of them with his camera.

episodes.name: Sailing Away
episodes.overview: Maggie has a new telescope and decides they should go on a sailing adventure - to find the mysterious Secret Island. They set off in a big paper boat and, with the help of a seagull, finally reach the island, which turns out to be very, very small. They decide to keep Secret Island a secret.

episodes.name: Hamilton's Pet
episodes.overview: Hamilton finds a friendly little fish in the River of Dreams and decides to keep him for a pet. He puts Fishy in a baby carriage and takes him for a walk, but Fishy looks very unhappy. Realizing that his pet is homesick, Hamilton decides to take him back to the River and say farewell.

episodes.name: Slooow Motion
episodes.overview: One day Maggie, Hamilton and the Beast find themselves on a strange beach crowded with turtles. Tired out from playing Follow the Maggie, they decide to play Follow the Turtle for a change. This forces them to sloooooow dooooown, and they start to notice all the little things on the beach that they never noticed before!

episodes.name: The Big Duck
episodes.overview: Who is that big duck in the River of Dreams, and why is she following Maggie, Hamilton and the Beast? Hamilton and the Beast are a little scared of her, but Maggie makes friends with the Duck and finds out she just wants to give them a ride across the river.

episodes.name: Flim-Flam-A Fiddle
episodes.overview: The Beast always wins at checkers, Hamilton always wins at croquet, and it's making them argue. Maggie suggests they play a brand new game she's made up called Flim-Flam-a-Fiddle. This game involves jumping, crawling, somersaulting and lots of shouting - and best of all there are no winners and no losers!

episodes.name: A Beastly Garden
episodes.overview: When Maggie brings a watermelon to Nowhere Land, the Beast decides to plant the seeds and grow his very own watery-melon garden. The Beast tends his garden carefully, watering it and watching over it day and night. Soon his efforts are rewarded with three nice big watermelons - one for each.

episodes.name: Spring Cleaning
episodes.overview: Hamilton is doing his spring cleaning, which he says is the most fun thing to do on a spring day. The Beast tries to help out, but ends up making a big mess. Hamilton sends Maggie and the Beast off to clean up the rest of Nowhere Land. This turns out to be a pretty big job, and not much fun at all.

episodes.name: Three Little Ghosts
episodes.overview: It's a dark and spooky night, and the Beast has dressed up as a ghost to scare his friends. What he doesn't know is that Hamilton and Maggie are dressed up as ghosts too. And when they meet up with a fourth ghost (their friend Nedley) they all get a good scare!

episodes.name: The King of Nowhere Land
episodes.overview: Maggie's brought a crown to Nowhere Land and Hamilton volunteers to be the king. Once he is crowned, however, he realizes that kings don't get to do anything fun. He finally abdicates to bake some apple pies.

episodes.name: The Big Scare
episodes.overview: The Beast has a big scare when he sees a mouse! Maggie and Hamilton make friends with Pippi the mouse who, it turns out, is just as scared of the Beast as the Beast is of him. Once they get to know each other, however, they aren't scared anymore, and the Beast gives Pippi a ride back to his home in Cheese Land.

episodes.name: Mr. Shivers
episodes.overview: Maggie's got a magic snow globe that makes it snow in Nowhere Land! The three friends build a snowman, who comes to life as the very jovial Mr. Shivers. When the sun comes out they must escort Mr. Shivers to the top of Highest Mountain, where it's always snowy and he won't have to worry about melting.

episodes.name: Nap Time
episodes.overview: Tired out from playing, Hamilton announces that it's nap time. They lie down, they toss and turn... they just can't seem to fall asleep! The Dream Sheep come to the rescue, bleating a lullaby so soothing that it puts the sheep themselves to sleep. Finally everyone is slumbering peacefully - except for a disgruntled Hamilton.

episodes.name: Up, Up and Away
episodes.overview: It's very windy - a perfect day for kite-flying, if they only had a kite. Maggie and Hamilton start to build one, and the Beast wants to help out, but he's not very good with strings and tape. In the end however it's the Beast who saves the day by contributing his spots to make the tail.

episodes.name: Louder! Louder!
episodes.overview: During a contest to see who can shout the loudest (causing the loudest echo), the Beast roars a little too ferociously and loses his voice. This is a very serious problem - how can he be ferocious without a roar? Maggie helps him practice his ferocious facial expressions while Hamilton makes him some special blueberry tea that will help him get his voice back.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Time
episodes.overview: The Beast wants to hear his favourite story again, for the umpteenth time, but Hamilton is very tired of reading it to him! Maggie suggests they act it out instead, but when they do, the familiar tale starts to take on some strange new twists. Hamilton is troubled at first by the changes, but he gets in the spirit of things as they improvise a much more exciting story than the original.

episodes.name: Maggie the Mommy
episodes.overview: Maggie is dressed up like a Mommy, with high heels, a hat and real perfume! She recruits Hamilton to be the baby in her baby carriage, and the Beast to be the family dog.

episodes.name: Hamilton's Box Car
episodes.overview: Its time to go to the beach! Hamilton has built a cardboard box car and wants to drive there rather than riding along with his friends. Maggie and the Beast spend the afternoon swimming, but Hamilton never shows up. When they finally find him by the side of the road with his car in pieces, Hamilton has to admit that the best way to get around Nowhere Land is not by car, but by Ferocious Beast!

episodes.name: Happy Birthday to All of Us
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton and the Beast all have the same birthday, so they¹ve planned a very big, triple birthday party. The Beast is embarrassed by his humble gifts to his friends, but is cheered up when Hamilton and Maggie love his presents. Hamilton is upset that he hasn't grown since their last birthday so he is wearing big awkward shoes to make himself taller. Maggie tells him he may not be taller but he's certainly wiser.

episodes.name: The Really Big Show
episodes.overview: The three friends decide to put on a show for their friends. Hamilton is doing magic tricks, Maggie will recite a poem, but the Beast is being very secretive about his act.

episodes.name: Hamilton Blows His Horn
episodes.overview: Hamilton is in ecstasy when he receives a trombone as a present, and he plays it non-stop. When he is forced to stop, Maggie comforts him and points out that his voice is a very lovely musical instrument.

episodes.name: The Big Cheese
episodes.overview: When Rudy hurts his foot in the Big Cheese, he refuses to move it, so Beast and Maggie go off to find him medical attention. While they are gone, Hamilton catches his sweater on a hook and Rudy has to overcome his pain to rescue his friend Hamilton.

episodes.name: Roll Over Archie
episodes.overview: When Maggie, Beast and Hamilton come across a toy Scotty dog, they turn him on and play until he runs out of steam. Then, when they replace his batteries, he proves to have too much energy.

episodes.name: Desert Treasure
episodes.overview: Our three friends, Maggie, Beast and Hamilton head off into the desert to find a treasure. While there, they meet up with a snake and make friends with a camel named Kalee. Kalee takes them to a wonderous Lemonade Spring.

episodes.name: Morning in Nowhere Land
episodes.overview: We watch Hamilton and Beast go through their morning routines until Maggie comes and joins them, ready to start a new day!

episodes.name: The Missing Sweater
episodes.overview: When Hamilton lends his favorite sweater to Nedley, he has a rough time getting it back from him. Fortunately, Maggie comes up with a plan.

episodes.name: Just a Little Off the Top
episodes.overview: Maggie brings a whole load of barbershop items, and she clips hair and buff nails. When Rudy and Nedley arrive to complete a foursome with Beast and Hamilton, a barbershop quartet is formed, complete with the works.

episodes.name: Little Pig Lost
episodes.overview: While blowing up some balloons, Hamilton gets pulled up into the sky. Maggie and Beast become concerned when they can't find him. A fretful and teary Hamilton realizes that he's lost, but he then comes up with a way to signal Maggie and Beast, and everyone is happily brought back together.

episodes.name: The Cecil Bunions Detective Agency
episodes.overview: When the Cecil Bunions Detective badges finally arrive in via mail, Maggie, Hamilton and Beast go out to figure out some elusive mysteries.

episodes.name: The Jelly Bean Express
episodes.overview: Nowhere Land gets its own train when Hamilton, Beast and Maggie put out the tracks. The Jelly Bean team becomes the passengers, and the Nowhere Land Express makes it's way to Sand Castle Beach.

episodes.name: Let's Play Croquet
episodes.overview: While playing croquet, Hamilton, Beast and Maggie quickly lose their croquet balls in the grassy meadow. They then come up with an ingenious plan to use the Dream Sheep to help them mow the grass.

episodes.name: Little Ducky
episodes.overview: When a large egg hatches near our infamous trio, a tiny duckling thinks that Beast is its mother, and it follows him everywhere. When they come across the Big Duck, they discover that she is the duckling's real mother.

episodes.name: Don't Dump That Junk
episodes.overview: When a flood whisks away Hamilton's box, our trio sets out on an adventure to rescue it with the help of the Jelly Bean Team.

episodes.name: Soup Bowls and Roller Coasters
episodes.overview: When Maggie, Hamilton, Rudy and Beast take a trip to an amusement park, they get to ride on the Super Duper Roller Coaster! But is the Roller Coaster a little too "Super Duper" for Hamilton?

episodes.name: Rainy Day
episodes.overview: When a flood whisks away Hamilton's box, our trio sets out on an adventure to rescue it with the help of the Jelly Bean Team.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to Visit
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton and Beast eagerly await the arrival of Beast’s cousin Reggie who they are meeting for the first time. When he finally arrives, he turns out not to be what they expected.

episodes.name: The Lonesome Traveler
episodes.overview: When Beast takes off to Turkey Town to leave Hamilton and Maggie to their knitting, he encounters some turkeys that refuse to leave him alone. In the end, Maggie and Hamilton find the Beast unable to leave and form a fence around the turkeys.

episodes.name: The Home of the Kindly Giant
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton and Beast bring the triplets to the land of the Kindly Giant where everything is twice its normal size. When the triplets fall into a giant blueberry pie, our trio has to figure out a way to get them out.

episodes.name: The Funny Smile
episodes.overview: When Beast loses a tooth, he becomes too embarrassed to pose for a Nowhere Land scrapbook that Maggie is trying to put together. Eventually she and Hamilton convince him that he looks just as ferocious without the tooth.

episodes.name: Guess Who I Am!
episodes.overview: When Beast begins pretending to be Hamilton, it prompts a game in which the three of them imitate several of the Nowhere Land regulars and try to "Guess who I am."

episodes.name: House for a Mouse
episodes.overview:
Hamilton makes a gingerbread house for his friend Rudy. However, when Rudy invites some friends over to play, things get out of control and the house gets eaten.

This

episodes.name: Nothing in the Beach Ball
episodes.overview: When Beast punctures a beach ball, our trio goes to the beach ball factory where they meet their friend Nedley and try to get a new ball. However, once there they discover that something is wrong so they stay until they get to the bottom of the problem.

episodes.name: Picnic Time
episodes.overview: When Hamilton, Beast and Maggie try to have a friendly picnic, they are overcome with ants and have to find a clever way to get rid of them.

episodes.name: The New Rubber Ball
episodes.overview: When Maggie gets Beast the rubber ball he has always wanted, he becomes obsessed with it. However, when the triplets come over for a birthday party and he hasn't anything to give them, he generously gives them his beautiful new ball.

episodes.name: Ride 'Em Cowboy
episodes.overview: Hamilton, Maggie, Beast, Rudy and the Jelly Bean Team all visit Little Dodge City to hold a square dance and find some bad guys.

episodes.name: Right Next Door
episodes.overview: When Beast mentions that he would like to have a home in Nowhere Land, Maggie gets him a big door where he becomes Hamilton’s neighbor and receives mail for the first time.

episodes.name: Hamilton's Sailboat
episodes.overview: When Hamilton builds a raft, our trio sets sail into the middle of the pond. However when the wind dies down, Beast comes up with a new way of getting them back to shore.

episodes.name: The Big Hat
episodes.overview: When a big brown hat blows on top of Hamilton's box, he builds a restaurant inside it and serves Beast and Maggie an exotic meal. However he ends up closing earlier than expected when he finds out the hat belongs to the Kindly Giant.

episodes.name: The Camping Trip
episodes.overview: When our friends decide to camp out, Beast begins to think there is a bear in the woods and becomes nervous. To calm his nerves, Maggie and Hamilton use fireflies to light up the campsite. This works until a bear invades their site, an adorable teddy bear that is.

episodes.name: The Leaning Tower of Carrot
episodes.overview: When Beast leans against Nedley's birdhouse, he tilts it and all the birds flee. Unable to straighten it, he enlists the aid of Maggie and Hamilton who get a big potato from the Kindly Giant's patch and use it to right the birdhouse.

episodes.name: Catch Me If You Can
episodes.overview: When Hamilton makes a batch of gingerbread men, they come alive and our trio chases them all over Nowhere Land. When Maggie, Hamilton and Beast finally catch them, they figure out somewhere for them to stay.

episodes.name: Strings, Pumpkins and Hats
episodes.overview: Hamilton decides to have a contest to see who has the best collectible. When everyone votes for himself or herself, they all win.

episodes.name: The Missing Bass
episodes.overview: When Hamilton comes across a beautiful violin, he falls in love with it. So when a cool cat named B.B. Katz claims the violin, Hamilton is reluctant to give it up. However, he quickly snaps out of it when the two end up playing beautiful music together.

episodes.name: Message in a Bottle
episodes.overview: When Maggie, Hamilton and Beast find a message in a bottle, they eagerly follow the instructions, which will lead them to a treasure. When they finally end up at a beautiful picnic spread, they realize that Hamilton has set up the whole thing.

episodes.name: A Visit to Cake Town
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton, Beast and Rudy venture off to Cake Town and discover cakes galore! And they taste even better than they look, but is it possible to have too much?

episodes.name: Hamilton's Important Letter
episodes.overview: When Hamilton discovers that the letter ‘H’ on his sweater is missing, he is beside himself. Maggie tries to comfort him but to no avail. Luckily they discover that Hamilton has been wearing his sweater inside out and the ‘H’ has been there all along.

episodes.name: The Snow Show
episodes.overview: A winter snowfall blankets Nowhere Land and we follow our trio through a series of activities that eventually take them to the frozen pond where the Moo Sisters sing and help Hamilton overcome his apprehension of skating.

episodes.name: School Days
episodes.overview: School has come to Nowhere Land when Maggie takes on the role of teacher and engages Hamilton, Beast, Nedley and Rudy in a series of classroom exercises.

episodes.name: The Nowhere Land Parade
episodes.overview: It's Nowhere Land Day and Maggie, Hamilton and Beast have a parade. Unfortunately, Beast can't figure what his contribution to the parade should be. Finally, Maggie realizes that every parade needs a float and recruits Beast as the perfect candidate.

episodes.name: The Beast and the Balloon
episodes.overview: When Maggie and Hamilton do their best to avoid eating Beast’s pancakes and he finds out, he feels worthless. Luckily Maggie, Hamilton and Rudy cheer him up by listing his all his fabulous, ferocious attributes.

episodes.name: The Beast's Big Surprise
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton and Beast go for a ride in a hot air balloon, but Beast is so scared he has to close his eyes. Maggie and Hamilton entice Beast into opening his eyes by playing a game of ‘I Spy’.

episodes.name: Land of the Antique Toys
episodes.overview: Our trio goes to the land of the Antique Toys where they see their old friend Archie, play with some fun toys and meet a robot named Romar.

episodes.name: Maggie's Song
episodes.overview: Hamilton, Rudy and the Beast surprise Maggie with her very own song.

episodes.name: The Buffle-headed Booby
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton and Beast go on a bird watching adventure to find the elusive Buffleheaded Booby.

episodes.name: Hamilton and the Bee
episodes.overview: When our trio discover they need honey for their tea party, Hamilton dresses up like a bee to get some from a nearby hive.

episodes.name: Go to Sleep, Sheep
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton and Beast come across a dream sheep that can’t fall asleep. They devise all sorts of strategies to help him nod off.

episodes.name: The Missing Spot
episodes.overview: When Beast wakes up one morning to find a spot missing, he, Hamilton and Maggie put on their Cecil Bunions detective badges to find it.

episodes.name: Blue Moon
episodes.overview: After Hamilton inadvertently grows a huge beanstalk, he climbs up it and visits Mr. Moon. While there, he realizes the moon is depressed, so he, B.B. Katz and the Moo Sisters sing Mr. Moon a song to cheer him up.

episodes.name: The Beached Whale
episodes.overview: Sidestep enlists Maggie, Hamilton and the Beast to help a beached baby whale back into the water.

episodes.name: A Flag for Nowhere Land
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton and Beast make a flag for Nowhere Land and plant it on top of Highest Mountain.

episodes.name: Desert Cactus
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton and Beast go to see Kalee in the desert, and on their way, they befriend a lonely little cactus.

episodes.name: The Invitation
episodes.overview: When Nedley sends out fancy invitations to a dinner party, everyone assumes it’s going to be a very formal affair. However, when they get to Nedley’s, it turns out to be quite different.

episodes.name: Trick or Treat
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton, Beast and Rudy dress up and go trick or treating.

episodes.name: The Trade Off
episodes.overview: When Hamilton trades his Kazoo for a yoyo, and the yoyo breaks, he does his best to get his Kazoo back.

episodes.name: Hamilton's Magic
episodes.overview: When Beast discovers a frog under Hamilton's magician hat, he assumes Hamilton has turned himself into a frog by a magic trick gone horribly wrong.

episodes.name: Nedley's Circus
episodes.overview: When the gang finds out that Nedley is running away to join the circus, they put on a circus of their own to convince Nedley to stay.

episodes.name: Chasing a Rainbow
episodes.overview: After a heavy rainfall, Hamilton, Maggie and Beast travel to Mud Creek looking for the end of the rainbow.

episodes.name: The Ice Cream Cart
episodes.overview: Maggie rides into Nowhere Land on an ice cream cart and the gang decides to make ice cream! However, they quickly realize they first have to visit Mr. Shivers to get ice.

episodes.name: That's Amazing!
episodes.overview: When Maggie, Hamilton, Rudy and Beast get stuck in a giant hedge maze, they rely on the Kindly Giant to guide them out.

episodes.name: The Humongous Fungus
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton and Beast go on an adventure to find the Humongous Fungus.

episodes.name: The Big Hole
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton, Beast and Rudy put on their construction gear and dig a giant hole.

episodes.name: Oh Give Me a Home
episodes.overview: When Sidestep’s castle gets washed away, the gang does their best to help him rebuild.

episodes.name: Which Way Did He Go
episodes.overview: When the triplets visit in a pedal car, they take off on Maggie, Beast and Hamilton and visit all the wonderful places in Nowhere Land.

episodes.name: Blast Off
episodes.overview: Maggie, Hamilton and Beast build a play space ship and pretend to visit Mars.

episodes.name: Hamilton's Hat
episodes.overview: When Hamilton refuses to take his hat off, the others begin to wonder why.

episodes.name: The Wish Fish
episodes.overview: When a fish in a wishing well helps out Maggie, Hamilton and Beast, they return the favor by granting the fish a wish.

episodes.name: Rudy, Rudy, Rudy
episodes.overview: Rudy finds a coconut and tries to come up with clever and inventive ways of cracking it open.

episodes.name: Friendship Day
episodes.overview: Everyone gets together to open their Friendship Day Cards, but become curious when Beast receives more than his share.

episodes.name: The Contraption
episodes.overview: Hamilton designs a contraption and enlists Maggie and Beast to collect all the necessary pieces to put it together.

episodes.name: The Chicken Ladies
episodes.overview: Two chicken sisters arrive at the Oasis selling eggs, but when their truck breaks down, Maggie, Hamilton and Beast soon discover these chickens deliver more than eggs.

episodes.name: Nedley Needs a Box
episodes.overview: When Nedley needs to borrow Hamilton’s box for his move, Hamilton is reluctant to lend it.

episodes.name: Tag-along Reggie
episodes.overview: A pleasant trip to the desert turns sour when Beast’s cousin Reggie decides to tag along.

episodes.name: Curtain Up
episodes.overview: Hamilton overcomes several opening night mishaps to put on a play.

episodes.name: Icing on the Cake
episodes.overview: Hamilton instructs his friends, in typical talk show fashion, on how to ice a cake.

episodes.name: Where's Maggie
episodes.overview: When Maggie takes longer than usual to show up, Hamilton and Beast begin to worry.

episodes.name: The Bunny Slippers
episodes.overview: While at a slumber party, Beast yearns for a pair of Bunny Slippers until he discovers something special about his own slippers.

episodes.name: The Windy Day
episodes.overview: When the wind blows Maggie's map away, our three friends search all over Nowhere Land looking for it.

episodes.name: Nedley's Glasses
episodes.overview: When Nedley compromises his sight by wearing a pair of glasses to look more sophisticated, the others plead with him to take them off.
